body:
### Steps to reproduce

```
[kaig1@login5 summit-gpu]$ spack install the-silver-searcher
```

This happens on Summit and on Spock, using gcc/{10.2,10.3}, respectively. Looks like an issue with the actual package.

### Error message

```
[kaig1@login5 summit-gpu]$ spack install the-silver-searcher
[+] /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/kaig1/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-power9le/gcc-10.2.0/pcre-8.44-4amsw5xvzgonwyokg3ka7v34l4pwkrke
[+] /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/kaig1/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-power9le/gcc-10.2.0/pkgconf-1.8.0-obeuywixsnfpcskdecetxyzkculkthd2
[+] /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/kaig1/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-power9le/gcc-10.2.0/xz-5.2.5-gozs4kdm3uv75ucut4sqinla6lo4vw7i
[+] /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/kaig1/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-power9le/gcc-10.2.0/zlib-1.2.11-zkagthm7bqmy3eeeakauipekotv2op2i
==> Installing the-silver-searcher-2.2.0-lovxaqgrz5czyimjac6hjpf656ovaec2
==> No binary for the-silver-searcher-2.2.0-lovxaqgrz5czyimjac6hjpf656ovaec2 found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/kaig1/src/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/d9/d9621a878542f3733b5c6e71c849b9d1a830ed77cb1a1f6c2ea441d4b0643170.tar.gz
==> No patches needed for the-silver-searcher
==> the-silver-searcher: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> the-silver-searcher: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> the-silver-searcher: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16' 'V=1'

1 error found in build log:
     257    src/main.o:/tmp/kaig1/spack-stage/spack-stage-the-silver-searcher-2.2.0-lovxaqgrz5czyimjac6hjpf656ovaec2/spack-
            src/src/log.h:12: multiple definition of `print_mtx'
     258    src/ignore.o:/tmp/kaig1/spack-stage/spack-stage-the-silver-searcher-2.2.0-lovxaqgrz5czyimjac6hjpf656ovaec2/spac
            k-src/src/log.h:12: first defined here
     259    src/zfile.o:/tmp/kaig1/spack-stage/spack-stage-the-silver-searcher-2.2.0-lovxaqgrz5czyimjac6hjpf656ovaec2/spack
            -src/src/options.h:94: multiple definition of `opts'
     260    src/ignore.o:/tmp/kaig1/spack-stage/spack-stage-the-silver-searcher-2.2.0-lovxaqgrz5czyimjac6hjpf656ovaec2/spac
            k-src/src/options.h:94: first defined here
     261    src/zfile.o:/tmp/kaig1/spack-stage/spack-stage-the-silver-searcher-2.2.0-lovxaqgrz5czyimjac6hjpf656ovaec2/spack
            -src/src/log.h:12: multiple definition of `print_mtx'
     262    src/ignore.o:/tmp/kaig1/spack-stage/spack-stage-the-silver-searcher-2.2.0-lovxaqgrz5czyimjac6hjpf656ovaec2/spac
            k-src/src/log.h:12: first defined here
  >> 263    collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
     264    make: *** [Makefile:471: ag] Error 1

See build log for details:
  /tmp/kaig1/spack-stage/spack-stage-the-silver-searcher-2.2.0-lovxaqgrz5czyimjac6hjpf656ovaec2/spack-build-out.txt
```

I'm more than happy to add the complete debug if requested, but I don't think it adds anything useful.

### Information on your system

[kaig1@login5 summit-gpu]$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.2-4066-4f3a538519
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-rhel8-power9le
* **Concretizer:** original

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [X] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
title: installation issue: the-silver-searcher
